title: Lifeline

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Transfer all attacks between two players at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All attacks, regardless of their origin, will swap their targets. This can include indirect attacks.
- Your ability does not produce a notification.
- Astral

desc:
Post 3319
*Luka died last night. They were shot by the Veteran they visited. Their role was Veteran.*
